thread.title: UCLA, trying to rebound from injuries and loss, faces Stanford
thread.title_full: UCLA, trying to rebound from injuries and loss, faces Stanford - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tom FitzGerald
title: UCLA, trying to rebound from injuries and loss, faces Stanford
text:
Photo: Kevork Djansezian, Getty Images Head coach Jim Mora and the Bruins were taken down a few pegs in a loss to Arizona State on Oct. 3. Head coach Jim Mora and the Bruins were taken down a few pegs in a...
In September, the UCLA Bruins were riding high. They won their first four games and eventually got to No. 7 in the national rankings. Head coach Jim Mora and the Bruins were taken down a few pegs in a loss to Arizona State on Oct. 3. Head coach Jim Mora and the Bruins were taken down a few pegs in a...
In September, the UCLA Bruins were riding high. They won their first four games and eventually got to No. 7 in the national rankings.
